title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] Added voice feature for end-user fix #325
summary:
## Related Issue
Closes #325

## Summary
Adds voice input capability to Cortex Linux, enabling users to speak commands instead of typing them. This implementation uses local speech-to-text processing with Whisper for privacy and low latency.

### Features Added
- **Voice command mode**: `cort

Closes #355

**Summary**
This PR fixes an issue where [cortex wizard](vscode-file://vscode-app/usr/share/code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) exits early even when a valid API key is already exported in the environment.

Currently, the wizard always prompts

title: [PR] Feature/custom ai roles
summary:
Fixes #270

This PR introduces support for custom AI roles/personas for specialized tasks in Cortex.

Key changes:
- Added a new `--role` CLI flag (default: `default`)
- Implemented YAML-backed role definitions
- Included built-in roles: `default`, `security`, `devops`
- Role-specific `syste

title: feat: Add idiomatic pkg/tts package with ElevenLabs support for custom voice
summary:
## Summary

Add a production-grade, idiomatic Go TTS package (`pkg/tts`) that abstracts text-to-speech providers, enabling custom voice support via ElevenLabs, local TTS models, and OpenAI as fallback.
